title: Looking for Neo-grotesque
content:
Hello,

I am looking for the neo-grotesque saying "Jane Jacobs" in this picture:

[http://www.therodina.com/wp-content/uploads/Ekonomie\_mest\_1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012173601/http:/www.therodina.com/wp-content/uploads/Ekonomie_mest_1.jpg "http://www.therodina.com/wp-content/uploads/Ekonomie\_mest\_1.jpg")

In contrast to similar fonts the upper-case "J" has no bar and its tails das not point upwards.

Thanks in advance.
author: G.O.G.
